title: Loading Screen Idea; Reorder the Player List...
body:
Currently in Summoner's Rift games, the playlist  (displayed when hitting 'Tab') has no dependence on the position being played. 
In the pro games, the order of the players is always the same; Top, Jungle, Mid, ADC and then Support.
This order is quite intuitive and I believe if could be implemented it could be useful.
Gaining information should be as quick as possible, but in the current state it requires a second two to look through and sort the random list. 
If you could customise your order, say while in loading, you could know exactly where to look to check the ADCs CS without a second thought. 

It would at most save a second or two, I understand that may seem insignificant, but I don't see any disadvantages for this benefit, besides Riot coding it.

replies.body: While they're at it, they should have backgrounds during loading screen as well. Please.
